about_the_game:
Tilt your way in and out of the capital on the busy West Coast Main Line. The Class 390 Pendolino in Avanti West Coast livery swings into action, racing along this thrilling route with Train Sim World 5. All aboard!

Built to be one of the fastest domestic units in the UK, the Class 390 was part of a visionary project to overhaul the vital services that run between London and Glasgow.

Utilising innovative tilting technology, the Class 390 Pendolino revolutionised travel by leaning into corners – maintaining passenger comfort at higher speeds along the twisting bends of the WCML.

Originally delivered in 8-car formation, today’s high demand of travel sees the fleet of 56 units divided into 9 and 11-car sets, each capable of racing passengers along at 450+ passengers at a time.

With 2 decades of service and having accrued over 300 million miles on the clock, Avanti West Coast’s Class 390s have undergone a full refurbishment programme to be fit the for the future.

Climb into the cab of the iconic Pendolino and begin your journey on Train Sim World 5’s West Coast Main Line. As an Avanti West Coast driver or conductor, get familiar with the unique operating practices of a high-spec, inter-city multiple unit, and enjoy life from a new angle as you speed around corners into London Euston.

Key Features

  • BR Class 390 Pendolino EMU in Avanti West Coast livery

  • 390/0 9-car and 390/1 11-car variants included

  • Step into the highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cab of this inter-city legend

  • Experience the powerful, true-to-life suspension, performance handling and tilting

  • Accessible Tutorial on the Training Center

  • Embark on engaging Scenarios and a Timetable Layer for West Coast Main Line: London Euston - Milton Keynes

  • Livery Designer, Formation Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club

  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology

  • Download size: 337.8 MB
